column1: The cabin begins to depressurize—intentional sabotage? Each crew member may attempt one Hard Technology check to fix it, but if all fail they must don vacc suits or pass a CON check to avoid passing out. After 1 hour, any characters without a vacc suit die.
The cargo shifts during a grav compensator malfunction. Pass a Normal STR check to place them back by force, before they become a serious problem.
Sensors are producing false readings—they say you exited warpspace. Are the sensors correct? If so, what happened?
A cargo container explodes, causing a chemical fire which destroys D6 Supplies.
General power failure. Crew is forced to wear their Site breathing gear and consume Oxygen Pellets. Each Technology check to fix the problem consumes 1×Oxygen Pellet per crew member.
An issue with the air recycler causes D4 oxygen tanks to be consumed before the crew realizes it and fixes the problem.
The battery array is leaking radiation. All crew members receive D100 rads before they realize and fix it.
A malfunction with the rudimentary onboard kitchen irremediably ruins D4 Supplies.
The lavatory malfunctions, causing an unpleasant mess. All crew members gain D10 Stress.
Life support’s temperature regulator stops working. Temperature drops steadily 1°F each minute, until it's repaired.
